Posts.Content:
Well, despite that cheery August reply, I just wanted to say thank you to the rest of you for your ideas regarding how to get the insurance company to pay for the test.  Blue Cross/Blue Shield of Illinois has only paid a small portion of the cost, saying that I used an out of network provider.  I don't understand their logic, since to the best of my knowledge, Genomic Health is the 
 provider of the Oncotype DX test.
Posts.Title: Oncotype DX Test and Insurance
